isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - Stop, Tail, Turn and Hazard Signal Lights With Flasher

svcproc.title: Stop, Tail, Turn and Hazard Signal Lights With Flasher
svcproc.para: This set of circuits contains the turn signal switch, stop light switch, flasher unit (turn signal/hazard), right and left turn relays, stop light relay, and right and left stop, turn, and tail light assemblies for the rear of the vehicle. The turn indicators located in the instrument cluster are also included.
